thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bonduelle To Acquire From Conagra Del Monte Processed Fruit And Vegetable Business In Canada

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bonduelle To Acquire From Conagra Del Monte Processed Fruit And Vegetable Business In Canada

organizations.name: conagra del monte processed fruit and vegetable business in canada feb

text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Bonduelle Sas:
* REG-BONDUELLE ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE FROM CONAGRA DEL MONTE PROCESSED FRUIT AND VEGETABLE BUSINESS IN CANADA
* TRANSACTION WILL BECOME FINAL AFTER SUSPENSIVE CONDITIONS ARE LIFTED BEFORE END OF MAY 2018.
* ACQUISITION FOR A TOTAL VALUE OF $43 MILLION CANADIAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
